title: Podcast Episode 186.1 – DILLION’S HEART by Loni Nichole
description:
Our audiobook this week is DILLON’S HEART by Loni Nichole

Jules
I don't have time to date, especially not the infuriatingly bossy, ridiculously hot sheriff. But Dillon Armstrong won't take no for an answer. And the more he shows up at my office, the harder it is to resist him and his high-handed, insufferable, oddly endearing ways. He's going to make me fall for him, I just know it.

Dillon
The first time I lay eyes on the little firecracker, I know my life will never be the same again. She’s determined to resist me, but I refuse to take no for an answer. I’ll play dirty if necessary. The feisty nurse stole my ornery old heart and now she’s stuck with me. I just have to convince her to take a chance on me. Or I’ll kidnap her. Whatever works.

GET THE eBOOK NOW: https://amzn.to/3RFHcVg
Loni Nichole: https://amzn.to/3BdHStZ
Giveaway: https://bit.ly/3eD6uVr

♥ ♥ ♥
